Posted By: DonSavik (1/9/2012 7:36:10 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Horrid... Compare to Earth or Fire Elementals, which also don't see play outside of limited, and this is worse. Just because something can be used in Limited doesn't justify the printing of total trash, especially now that WotC fully understands that creatures like this are unplayable.
  
   
I think WotC has a thing for horrible red creatures that cost around 5 mana - I guess they're still upset that the old Two-Headed Giant of Foryis was useful, and we're still paying for it decades later.
posts.html:
Horrid... Compare to Earth or Fire Elementals, which also don't see play outside of limited, and this is worse. Just because something can be used in Limited doesn't justify the printing of total trash, especially now that WotC fully understands that creatures like this are unplayable.

I think WotC has a thing for horrible red creatures that cost around 5 mana - I guess they're still upset that the old Two-Headed Giant of Foryis was useful, and we're still paying for it decades later.
